node.name: Clips Eclipse Plug-in
node.shortdescription:
This plug-in supports cut/copy/paste and management of multiple snippets of text.

* Commands
o Copy text selected in text editor as a clip Alt+Shift+X Alt+Shift+C
o Cut text selected in text editor as a clip Alt+Shift+X Alt+Shift+X
o Copy Clipboard text content as a clip Alt+Shift+X Alt+Shift+B
o Paste clip in active text editor Alt+Shift+X Alt+Shift+V. The pasted text is left selected. If this command is invoked again within ~1 sec the successive clips are pasted.
o Rotate Clips Up Alt+Shift+X Alt+Shift+9
o Rotate Clips Down Alt+Shift+X Alt+Shift+0
* Clips View - Shows the list of clips
* Clips View Actions
o Paste first selected clip in the active text editor
o Remove selected clips
o Remove All clips
o Rotate Clips Up
o Rotate Clips Down
o Move Clip Up
o Move Clip Down
* Clips preferences page
o Automatically create clips after Cut or Copy commands
o Number of clips to store
node.body:
This plug-in supports cut/copy/paste and management of multiple snippets of text.

* Commands
o Copy text selected in text editor as a clip Alt+Shift+X Alt+Shift+C
o Cut text selected in text editor as a clip Alt+Shift+X Alt+Shift+X
o Copy Clipboard text content as a clip Alt+Shift+X Alt+Shift+B
o Paste clip in active text editor Alt+Shift+X Alt+Shift+V. The pasted text is left selected. If this command is invoked again within ~1 sec the successive clips are pasted.
o Rotate Clips Up Alt+Shift+X Alt+Shift+9
o Rotate Clips Down Alt+Shift+X Alt+Shift+0
* Clips View - Shows the list of clips
* Clips View Actions
o Paste first selected clip in the active text editor
o Remove selected clips
o Remove All clips
o Rotate Clips Up
o Rotate Clips Down
o Move Clip Up
o Move Clip Down
* Clips preferences page
o Automatically create clips after Cut or Copy commands
o Number of clips to store
